20 Weeks $199

Triathlon Training Plan

Complete 20-week triathlon training program covering all three disciplines: swim, bike, and run. Whether it's your first triathlon or you're aiming for a personal best, this comprehensive plan will get you race-ready.

Start Training Now Learn More

Master All Three Disciplines

Our comprehensive program covers swimming, cycling, and running with structured training for each discipline plus crucial transition practice.

Swimming

  • • Technique development
  • • Endurance building
  • • Open water skills
  • • Sighting and navigation
  • • Wetsuit training

Cycling

  • • Power and endurance
  • • Aerodynamic positioning
  • • Hill climbing techniques
  • • Nutrition strategies
  • • Equipment optimization

Running

  • • Brick run training
  • • Pace management
  • • Running off the bike
  • • Heat management
  • • Final kick strategies

What's Included

Everything you need for successful triathlon training and racing.

20-Week Structured Plan

Progressive training schedule with base building, build phases, and race preparation.

Transition Training

Specific brick workouts and transition practice to master T1 and T2 efficiently.

Equipment Guidance

Recommendations for bikes, wetsuits, and gear plus setup and maintenance tips.

Nutrition Strategy

Race-day fueling plans and training nutrition for long-course events.

Race Strategy

Pacing strategies, race-day logistics, and mental preparation techniques.

Personal Coaching

Regular check-ins and personalized adjustments to your training plan.

20-Week Training Phases

Structured progression from base building to race-day readiness.

1-8

Base Building

  • • Aerobic development
  • • Technique focus
  • • Volume progression
  • • Equipment familiarization
9-12

Build Phase 1

  • • Intensity introduction
  • • Threshold training
  • • First brick workouts
  • • Open water practice
13-16

Build Phase 2

  • • Race-specific training
  • • Advanced brick sessions
  • • Transition practice
  • • Nutrition testing
17-20

Peak & Race

  • • Taper protocol
  • • Race simulation
  • • Final preparations
  • • Race execution

Choose Your Distance

Training plans adapted for different triathlon distances.

Sprint Distance

750m swim • 20K bike • 5K run
Perfect for beginners
  • 12-16 week program
  • 6-8 hours per week
  • Technique emphasis
  • Speed development
Most Popular

Olympic Distance

1.5K swim • 40K bike • 10K run
Standard distance
  • 16-20 week program
  • 8-12 hours per week
  • Endurance focus
  • Race strategy

Half Ironman

1.9K swim • 90K bike • 21K run
Long course challenge
  • 20-24 week program
  • 12-16 hours per week
  • Endurance building
  • Nutrition mastery
